英文公告.標案名稱: Authorize Service For the 2013 Kaohsiung Lantern Festival Activity.
英文公告.廠商地址: 2F., No.491, Sec. 6, Minquan E. Rd., Neihu District, Taipei City 114,Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: Contractor qualification:I. Contractor must have the approval of the registration (by government) without suspension II. This project consists of 3 categories of performances. Contractor requires the following qualifications and minimum 6 millions capitals for joining the bid.1.Firework: firecracker or firework related factories with the approval of registration.2.Water dance: related landscape construction, Water processing line engineering, Piping engineering, electric equipment engineering, electric cable setting engineering, illumination equipment installation, computer equipment installation, self-control equipment work, machine rental, machinery set industries with the approval of registration. 3.Promotion, exhibition & event planning: related planning, media, broadcasting, communication, public relations, and professional art performance industries with the approval of registration.
